name.en: Special topic on Advanced Instrumentation and application of atmospheric radiation
name.ch: 高等大氣輻射量測與應用特論

goal.en: This special topic is particularly for students who are interested in lidar and atmospheric radiation observations. This course will facilitate students to gain more knowledge on the theoretical background and technology development.
goal.ch: 此特論針對光達觀測與大氣輻射量測有興趣的學生所開設，讓學生更深入了解最新觀測技術理論及發展。

content.en: Covering comprehensive content on lidar and atmospheric radiation observations.
content.ch: 涵蓋完整的光達與大氣輻射觀測技術

domain.en: 基礎學科(共同) 、 大氣環境(大氣組)
domain.ch: 基礎學科(共同) 、 大氣環境(大氣組)
